title: [Large-scale] VR-Based Nursing Simulation Practical Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Mastery of fundamental nursing skills and clinical practice experience
context.additional_context: A VR simulation-based course for practicing nurses, focusing on enhancing high-risk situation response skills by replicating real clinical environments

learning_goals: Learners can perform acute patient nursing procedures with over 80% accuracy in a VR simulation environment
Learners can start equipment operation and simulations within 5 minutes with technical support in a VR-based scenario
Learners can derive at least three practical improvements through peer feedback after simulating three or more clinical situations
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
